Text: *sigh*
What a dramatic sigh.
Huh! Zeta...how long have you been standing there?
How long? I was here before you walked into the room.
A-Ahaha... I'm sorry.
...Wow, that page of your newspaper is in tatters.
Oh, thisâ€”

"Midgar Newspaper Association Seeks Writer for
Serial Novel" You want to be a writer, Beta?
...Do you think it's difficult to become a writer?

Not sure how to answer that since I've never looked
into it.
Oh... Well, guess you have a point.

Are you aiming to become a writer so you can gain
access to the MNA?
Well, that's part of it, but it's not the only reason.

Why not give it a shot if it's something you want to
try?
Zeta...

Tuna King is being interviewed by the MNA in Lindwurm
the day after tomorrow.

The piece will be on our first expansion as an
emerging stall venture outside the capital.

Naturally, journalists and editors from the MNA will
be there as well.

You mean...it'll be an opportunity to bring my
portfolio and pitch myself?
Exactly.
...I-I can't believe I showed up!

I couldn't finish a manuscript in two days, so I've
just compiled ideas and plotlines...

But if I approach them out of the blue and say, "I
want to be a writer. Please take a look at my ideas
and plotlines"...
...wouldn't they find me suspicious or intrusive?!
I-I'm suddenly starting to lose confidence!
Excuse me. May I sit here?

Oh... A-Are you a journalist?! Of course! Please,
please!
Thank you. Wow, Tuna King really is incredible!
Oh, um, I'm actually a temp worker of sorts.

Sorry, are you a journalist from the Midgar Newspaper
Association?
Yes. Here is my business card.
Th-Thank you. Sorry, I don't have oneâ€”
Please, don't worry about it. May I ask your name?
Oh, err...
...I'm Natsume.

A-Actually, I read that MNA is currently looking for
writers!

Hm? Yes, we are... Do you want to be a writer,
Ms. Natsume?
Well, yesâ€”

...I see. And do you have any stories that could be
serialized?
Oh... Um, wellâ€”

I understand your hesitation. After all, it's common
even for us journalists to have our work plagiarized.

But if you want to live off your writing, you must
start by showing someone your abilities and talent.
Very well...but they're still just ideas!

...Incredible! Your mind is a treasure trove of
curiosities!
D-Do you really think so?

Absolutely! "Little Red Riding Hood" and "Cinderella"
are strange tales, unlike anything I've read, yet...
They manage to capture something universal!

Can you write prose? We'll need to set you up with an
MNA editor immediately!

What? Are you sure? You haven't even read my
completed work yetâ€”

We edit the works of promising writers before we hire
them, even if they've yet to make their debut.

That's just how our hiring process worksâ€”don't worry
about it!

I see... In that case, I look forward to working with
the editor.

(Ohh! I never imagined the Shadow Wisdom that Master
Shadow taught me would come in handy like this!)
(Thank you...Master Shadow!)
